original: 一切眾類隨從彼人不能為障礙。
analyzed: 一切眾類隨從彼人不能為障礙。
translated: All kinds of beings will follow that person and not be able to obstruct them.
Because they protect all dharmas.
At that time, the World-Honored One praised the Four Heavenly Kings, saying:
You and the others are excellent, excellent!
You are able to bring great benefits to many people.
You are able to bring peace and happiness to many people.
You are able to protect the gods and humans.
Within the world, you uphold the true Dharma.
